references.paper_title: Power of hints for online learning with movement costs
references.reason: This paper builds upon prior work by exploring the impact of hints on online learning with additional cost factors, a theme relevant to the efficient query use in this paper.

references.paper_title: Bandit online linear optimization with hints and queries
references.reason: This paper investigates a related model using both hints and queries for online learning in the bandit setting, offering a comparison point to the current research on best-action queries.
